modName: Expert Mage Robe retexture - Twilight Sparkle - Female
summary: Small color change and addition to the robe.
descriptionHtml:
Updated: Made the cutie mark a little better.

Changed the color of the robe to be blue, added the universal symbol of love and magic onto the back.

My first mod. :)
Tried to improve the quality of the base texture, but didn\'t really help at all I think.
Added Twilight Sparkle\'s mark, blended it in a bit.

Anyway, thought I would share in case anyone else is interested.

No hate/troll softly please.

A couple of the images taken with one of the FXAA injector mods active, that\'s why its darker.

INSTALL

Extract the textures folder.
Drop it into your Skyrim Data folder.  (Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/Data)

This only adds 1 texture file under textures/clothes/magejourneyman/f/robes.dds
Delete it to uninstall.

------------
Free Use
Feel free to reuse, reupload, repack, and anything else you\'d like.
author: twilimage
